scripts.jshint: node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint www && node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint src && node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint tests
scripts.preparedemo_a: cd examples/demoA; cordova plugin rm cordova-plugin-appsflyer-sdk --save; cordova plugin add ../.. --link --save; cordova platform rm android; cordova platform add android; cordova platform rm ios; cordova platform add ios
scripts.preparedemo_c: cd examples/demoC; cordova plugin rm cordova-plugin-appsflyer-sdk --save; cordova plugin add ../.. --link --save; cordova platform rm android; cordova platform add android@8.0.0; cordova platform rm ios; cordova platform add ios
scripts.preparedemo_ionic: cd examples/Ionic-native; ionic cordova platform rm android; ionic cordova platform add android; ionic cordova platform rm ios; ionic cordova platform add ios
scripts.setup_a: cd examples/demoA; npm install; cd ../..; npm run preparedemo_a;
scripts.setup_c: cd examples/demoC; npm install; cd ../..; npm run preparedemo_c;
scripts.setup_ionic-native: cd examples/Ionic-native; npm install; cd ../..; npm run preparedemo_ionic;
scripts.demo_In.ba: cd examples/Ionic-native; ionic cordova build android
scripts.demo_In.ra: cd examples/Ionic-native; ionic cordova run android
scripts.demo_In.bi: cd examples/Ionic-native; ionic cordova build ios
scripts.demo_In.ri: cd examples/Ionic-native; ionic cordova run ios
scripts.demo_a.ra: cd examples/demoA; ionic cordova run android
scripts.demo_a.ba: cd examples/demoA; ionic cordova build android
scripts.demo_a.ri: cd examples/demoA; ionic cordova run ios
scripts.demo_a.bi: cd examples/demoA; ionic cordova build ios
